statement.p: A communications tower is located at the top of a steep hill, as shown. The angle of inclination of the hill is 65°. A guy wire is to be attached to the top of the tower and to the ground, 109 yd downhill from the base of the tower. The angle formed by the guy wire is 18°. Find the length of the cable required for the guy wire.
statement.em: NOTE: The picture is NOT drawn to scale.

p.em: Enter your answer as a number; your answer should be accurate to 2 decimal places.
